tweets.text: Please take extra care today. Flood alert from the @EnvAgency. If you see anyone in trouble anywhere around the coast, we're on call 24/7. üìûCall 999 and ask for the Coastguard #999Coastguard #Kent #Weather #flooding #coast https://t.co/5DRgaoKb5w

urls.title: River Ash Improvement Project - Colne Valley
urls.description: The River Ash is a distributary of the River Colne which flows for 10km between Staines and Shepperton. It was once a natural river but has been directly impacted by urbanisation resulting in many of the river‚Äôs natural features being lost and the valuable habitat it once offered to wildlife becoming degraded. The Colne Valley Regional Park has worked with Spelthorne Council, The Environment Agency and Spelthorne Natural History Society to successfully deliver a project to re-naturalise the River Ash adjacent to Bronzefield Prison in Ashford.

tweets.text:
We have transformed a 0.5km stretch of the River Ash to provide new habitats for fish, amphibians, invertebrates and waterfowl to thrive; with benefits for human visitors too. Thanks to our partners  @SpelthorneBC @EnvAgency & Spelthorne Nat His Soc
https://t.co/Kkijkr2SKo https://t.co/vlgocoDVkp

urls.title: Salisbury Central Area Framework - Wiltshire Council

tweets.text: #Salisbury, have your say about the future of your city. We and @wiltscouncil want to increase biodiversity whilst reducing flood risk and increasing recreational and leisure space #SalisburyRiverPark- what do you want to see? #LocalGrowthFund @SWLEP https://t.co/y97zdkpggc https://t.co/j4BgpMOk3F

Our work at Dovecliff Weir #Derbyshire reached a milestone on #WorldFishMigrationDay when we temporarily diverted the #RiverDove to gain safe access to remove the weir.

The #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme will be delivered in three phases. 

Phase one will be constructed in Kendal with phases two & three being in Burneside, Staveley and Ings.
 
More details about the three phases can be found online at https://t.co/MGRW7UHwzo
